description.value:
Usage worn shoes

Threadbare but trustworthy, your sandals have carried you this far, and they'll carry you much further still.

Immanence Your sandals ease your travels on the path ahead, granting you a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Transcendenceâ€”Marathon Dash 1 (transcendence) Your feet carry you so quickly they leave a slipstream that speeds your allies on. You Stride. Each ally within 10 feet of you at the start of your movement can Stride as a reaction.
